title: Connecting delegators to SPOs.
description: Due to distrust, single SPOs struggle to compete with commercial ventures, leading to demotivation > pool closes > centralization. \[1\]\[2\]\[3\]
solution: Create the go-to trusted platform for SPOs and delegators to connect, stake, communicate, research, educate and collaborate on Cardano.
experience: International team members with 16 years of technical experience. SPO since Oct 2020. Plutus pioneers and Emurgo Academy participants.
